commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
• Available
  • Busy
  • Away
  • Connect
  • Disconect

Chat

  • John Doe

    Hello Lucy, how can I help you today ?

    09:23AM

  • Lucy Doe

    Hi, I want to buy a new shoes.

    09:23AM

  • John Doe

    Shipment is free. You\'ll get your shoes tomorrow!

    09:25

  • Lucy Doe

    Wow, that\'s great!

    09:27

  • Lucy Doe

    Ok. Thanks for the answer. Appreciated.

    09:28

  • John Doe

    You are welcome!
    Is there anything else I can do for you today?

    09:30

  • Lucy Doe

    Nope, That\'s it.

    09:31

  • John Doe

    Thank you for contacting us today

    09:32
